text: Ekkehard Fasser (3 September 1952 â€“ 9 April 2021) was a Swiss bobsledder. He won a gold medal in the four-man event at the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary. Fasser also earned a gold medal in the four-man event at the 1983 FIBT World Championships in Lake Placid, New York. Fasser died on 9 April 2021, aged 68.Ekkehard Fasser ist gestorben ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Switzerland Category:Swiss bobsledders
title: Ekkehard Fasser
